snippet: The Britain-based manufacturer said that growth was strongest in Europe, up over 60 percent, while sales rose almost 40 percent in the Asia-Pacific region.
abstract: Global sales of luxury Rolls-Royce cars soar 33 percent to 1,968 vehicles during first half of 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Britain-based manufacturer said that growth was strongest in Europe, up over 60 percent, while sales rose almost 40 percent in the Asia-Pacific region.

headline.main: Despite Tepid Economy, Rolls-Royce Sales Soar
headline.print_headline: Despite Tepid Economy, Rolls-Royce Sales Soar
